sentences.sContent: The appearance of radio-controlled clock is a revolution in the history of the horology.
sentences.sContent_eng: The appearance of radio-controlled clock is a revolution in the history of the horology.
sentences.sCn: 电波钟表技术和产品的出现是人类计时历史上的又一次革命。

synos.tran: [仪]钟表学；测时法；钟表制造术

trans.tranOther: the art or science of making timepieces or of measuring time
